name: streamdotfun

Create custom on-screen widgets, token-based alerts, live chat overlays, market cap milestone triggers, and much more. Let your viewers trigger real-time reactions to buys, price movements, or major coin eventsâ€”making your stream not just content, but an experience. Turn every coin launch into a dynamic, community-fueled ride powered by your own token.
